title: Bug 42724: StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms
description: Bug 42724: StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms. I don't believe we even need to redraw the entire selection background anymore because there is code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection.
OB: When using the attached BidiUtil and typing one English character followed by three or more Arabic/Hebrew characters, placing the caret at the beginning of the line and selecting the next two characters (including one bidi character), the selection background includes unselected characters.
EB: The selection background should only include the selected characters and should not extend beyond them.
SR: Build 20030903: The attached BidiUtil exposes a bug in the selection rendering code in DisplayRenderer.drawLineSelectionBackground.
